languages.text: "Пусть казнит его, если считает нужным, и дело с концом".

traits.locale_text: "Пусть казнит его, если считает нужным, и дело с концом".

languages.text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."
languages.original_text: "Пусть казнит его, если считает нужным, и дело с концом".

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."
"Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

"Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

languages.text: 「必要と判断すれば、ソロモーンが彼を処刑しても構わない。それで一件落着としよう」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

traits.locale_text: 「必要と判断すれば、ソロモーンが彼を処刑しても構わない。それで一件落着としよう」

languages.text: "Solomorne, gerekli gördüğü takdirde adamı idam edebilir. Mesele burada kapanmıştır."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, gerekli gördüğü takdirde adamı idam edebilir. Mesele burada kapanmıştır."

languages.text: «Solomorne tiene permiso para ejecutarlo si lo estima oportuno. Tema suficientemente debatido».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne tiene permiso para ejecutarlo si lo estima oportuno. Tema suficientemente debatido».

languages.text: “既然索罗蒙觉得有必要，那就让他处决那个船员吧，这件事情就这么定了。”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

traits.locale_text: “既然索罗蒙觉得有必要，那就让他处决那个船员吧，这件事情就这么定了。”

languages.text: « Que Solomorne l'exécute s'il le juge nécessaire, et qu'on n'en parle plus. »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

traits.locale_text: « Que Solomorne l'exécute s'il le juge nécessaire, et qu'on n'en parle plus. »

languages.text: "Solomorne soll ihn exekutieren, wenn er es für richtig hält. Damit ist die Sache erledigt."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne may execute him if he deems it necessary, and let that be the end of it."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne soll ihn exekutieren, wenn er es für richtig hält. Damit ist die Sache erledigt."
